screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (int(textsize[0] * 1.1), int(textsize[1] * 1.1)) wsizex = textsize[0] + 30 wsizey = textsize[1] + 20 if 420 > wsizex: wsizex = 420 listlen = len(self.list) * 25 if listlen > 250: listlen = 250 wsizey += listlen self.instance.resize(eSize(*(wsizex, wsizey))) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, wsizey-listlen)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*(wsizex, listlen))) self.instance.move(ePoint((1280-wsizex)/2, (740-wsizey)/2))
